ygData.subject: Re: Pickled Gator and Lizard  and jars
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/12/1999 1:16:42 AM Pacific Standard Time, EQ_Potters@onelist.com writes: Well Met All ... in the Baking list. I m on most of the trade
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/12/1999 1:16:42 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Potters@onelist.com writes:

Well Met All

> Your lucky I'm also a potter you would have been better off posting this
in the Baking list.

I'm on most of the trade lists here and don't mind the information,
but agreed at least include the EQ_Baking list also.
I'm sure many of us clay throwers are bakers too.

> Pickle [Meat] = [Meat] + Vineger + Jug of Sauces

I'll try mine later too, only have a couple of the gator, but
was very curious when I started the thread.

Cleric Taven [Veeshan]
